thing-type.label: YRD120 Touchscreen deadbolt without key
thing-type.description: Touchscreen deadbolt without key<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtLock and unlock your door by entering your 4-8 digit pin code on the backlit, touchscreen keypad or through your Z-Wave smart home or alarm system app</li&gt <li&gtStore up to 100 unique pin codes to share with friends and family</li&gt <li&gt100% key free with a 9V battery back-up to prevent lock-outs</li&gt <li&gtInstalls on doors with just a screwdriver; fits 1-3/4 inch to 2-1/4 inch thick doors</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtThe lock can be included in a Z-Wave Network from the touchscreen as follows:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtTouch the lock screen to activate</li&gt <li&gtEnter the master pin and press #</li&gt <li&gtPress 7, then #</li&gt <li&gtPress 1, then #</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThe lock will now be in inclusion mode. Alternatively, the lock can be included by pressing and holding the radio button until the unit beeps 2 times. Release the button and the unit will enter inclusion mode.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtThe lock can be excluded from a Z-Wave Network from the touchscreen as follows:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtTouch the lock screen to activate</li&gt <li&gtEnter the master pin and press #</li&gt <li&gtPress 7, then #</li&gt <li&gtPress 3, then #</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThe lock will now be in exclusion mode. Alternatively, the lock can be excluded by pressing and holding the radio button until the unit beeps 5 times. Release the button and the unit will enter exclusion mode.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Audio Volume
parameter.description: Sets the volume level of the beeps and voice prompts<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 = Silent</p&gt <p&gt2 = Low</p&gt <p&gt3 = High</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Auto Re-lock
parameter.description: When enabled, the unit will automatically re-lock<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 = Off</p&gt <p&gt255 = On</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Re-lock time
parameter.description: Time after unlocking that the device will lock

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Wrong Code Entry Limit
parameter.description: The number of invalid tries before the lock shuts down and sends an alarm

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Shutdown Time
parameter.description: Number of times the device is locked out after the invalid retries are exceeded

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Operating Mode
parameter.description: Sets if the unit operates normal, or disables the keypad and Z-Wave lock/unlock<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 = Normal</p&gt <p&gt1 = Vacation Mode (User Codes Disabled)</p&gt <p&gt2 = Privacy Mode (User Codes and Z-Wave Disabled)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Alarm Reports
parameter.description: Alarm reports are sent out to all devices in the association group<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt
